body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Timothy Torres and I'm from Carzilla Auto. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Brittany. Can I please have your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it is five five five - two five five - four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Brittany. Is there anything else I can assist you with regarding the shipping concerns?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Brittany. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
